name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"ff8bef85-7ff1-435d-9bd4-c0f00d8a5112","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: get_unique_and_increment","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab78684d-8944-45e7-b65f-485b537c159e","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_unique_and_increment","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function generates and returns a unique numeric identifier each time it is called. It does so by reading the current value of an internal counter, incrementing it, and then returning the original value.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f610531f-94b8-4668-a420-66f504b29fa7","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This function ensures that every namespace defined within the FASTEN module map receives a distinct identifier. These identifiers are required by the FASTEN schema to reference namespaces consistently and unambiguously across modules, class hierarchies, and call graphs.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4d418e28-761f-4a11-bfea-566a898b4861","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Behavior","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"965748ec-9135-4add-9de9-e688921a0acb","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Returns the current value of the internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"unique","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" counter","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"625718c0-864b-42a5-9406-68e54b3f5c40","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Increments the counter immediately after retrieval","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"15ee9dc1-123a-4c1e-baa4-92c197841a83","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Guarantees monotonically increasing, non-repeating identifiers within a single formatter instance","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f4ffd7b2-1b22-410b-bf12-2ace495cabdf","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Design Rationale

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"By centralizing identifier generation in a single method, the formatter avoids collisions and simplifies namespace management. The sequential numbering approach provides predictable and stable references without requiring complex hashing or lookup mechanisms notes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"512b8485-a767-49a0-b269-d10c94526ddf","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"3e8bfd37-a1f2-46c3-b19b-166c968dda5b","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
